item.title: Apple is 2 years behind
item.description: Let's be serious for a second, despite the absurdity of the statements like ‘is Apple the next Blackberry?'. The only way Apple could be the next ‘Blackberry’ is if they do what Blackberry did, i.e. refuse to change and evolve with the marketplace. We've seen in the past that Apple does not do that. They delay product launches until they know they have a killer, or potentially amazing product. They watch the market like a hawk and work on a product to disrupt the market that actually makes a difference.
